name: TestScript.setup.action.assert.response
title: TestScript.setup.action.assert.response
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: okay | created | noContent | notModified | bad | forbidden | notFound | methodNotAllowed | conflict | gone | preconditionFailed | unprocessable
element.definition: okay | created | noContent | notModified | bad | forbidden | notFound | methodNotAllowed | conflict | gone | preconditionFailed | unprocessable.
element.comment: This is a shorter way of achieving similar verifications via "assert.responseCode".  If you need more control, then use "assert.responseCode"  e.g. <assert>  <contentType value="json" />  <response value="okay"/> </assert>.

binding.description: The type of response code to use for assertion.
